name: 車振華
objective:
* 本課程以有意願報考經濟部 iPAS 初級淨零碳規劃管理師能力鑑定之同學優先選課 *
「淨零」已成為全球產業發展的重要競爭優勢。淨零碳規劃管理師需要整合企業經營與永續管理，協助企業建立有效的碳管理體系，推動碳排放減少。本課程旨在幫助學生深入了解全球淨零趨勢，掌握溫室氣體盤查機制與減碳實踐，並學習協助企業實現綠色轉型，接軌國際永續發展。
"Net Zero" has become an important competitive advantage in global industrial development. Net Zero Carbon Emission Planning Administrators need to integrate business operations with sustainability management, helping companies establish effective carbon management systems and promote carbon emission reductions. This course aims to help students gain a deep understanding of global Net Zero trends, master Green House Gas inventory mechanisms and carbon reduction practices, and learn how to assist companies in achieving green transformation and aligning with international sustainable development goals.
